org.springframework.web.servlet.tags
Class BindTag

java.lang.Object
  javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.TagSupport
      org.springframework.web.servlet.tags.RequestContextAwareTag
          org.springframework.web.servlet.tags.BindTag
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.IterationTag, java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.Tag
public class BindTag
extends RequestContextAwareTag

Bind tag, supporting evaluation of binding errors for a certain bean or bean property. Exports a "status" variable of type BindStatus

The errors object that has been bound using this tag is exposed, as well as the property that this errors object applies to. Children tags can use the exposed properties

Discussed in Chapter 12 of Expert One-On-One J2EE Design and Development by Rod Johnson.

Author:
Rod Johnson, Juergen Hoeller
See Also:
Serialized Form

Method Detail

setPath

public void setPath(java.lang.String path)
             throws javax.servlet.jsp.JspException
Set the path that this tag should apply. Can be a bean (e.g. "person"), or a bean property (e.g. "person.name"), also supporting nested beans.

Throws:
javax.servlet.jsp.JspException

getPath

public java.lang.String getPath()
Retrieve the path that this tag should apply to

Returns:
the path that this tag should apply to or null if it is not set
See Also:
setPath(String)

getErrors

public Errors getErrors()
Retrieve the Errors instance that this tag is currently bound to. Intended for cooperating nesting tags.

Returns:
an instance of Errors

getProperty

public java.lang.String getProperty()
Retrieve the property that this tag is currently bound to, or null if bound to an object rather than a specific property. Intended for cooperating nesting tags.

getEditor

public java.beans.PropertyEditor getEditor()
Retrieve the property editor for the property that this tag is currently bound to. Intended for cooperating nesting tags.

Returns:
the property editor, or null if none applicable
